name: Frontier+ (Frontier+)
description:
It's an FPS-like 3D RPG set in a city in outer space.

This is a work in progress. Currently it's only a test bed for the game's engine capabilities to be proven. Play through to the end, to be forwarded to our online store... and then, please get something!

Controls

They do not work on mobile devices (for now).

WASD to move, mouse to look around.

Story

There currently isn't one. But... it's coming soon.

What happens if I win?

You'll be taken to our online store to select your award. Please note that a purchase is necessary to take receipt of your award. I said award, not reward. This shit ain't free.

What's with the video trailer?

It's a movie, enjoy it.
